reviews.review:
My personal favorite game on Steam.  And partly why I got a Steam account in the first place.

I could just leave it there, but there are quite a few things I can say about this game.  Nevertheless, I will try to keep this short to save your time.  Portal 2 (and the original Portal) is a puzzle game that plays like an fps.  You shoot two portals out of your gun.  You enter one portal and exit the other.  This is a simple but creative concept that allows for some crazy momentum-based gameplay.

The game's story mode is full of witty (and silly) humor.  While you can play this game without having played the first, I would still recommend playing both games in order for maximum satisfaction.

If my review alone doesn't sway you, then the thousands of other positive reviews here might just convince you.
Очень хорошая головоломка!

Once the campaign was finished, I needed something else to satisfy my need for portal puzzles. Luckily I found the community puzzles. 

I'll slowly be wasting away at this computer while I play through an infinite amount of community puzzles
Игра, являясь расширенной и усовершенствованной версией первой части, оправдала ожидания. Я довольна.

它太酷了，我喜欢它。不难不简单的关卡，有挑战性而不打击人们的自信;恰到好处的小提示使卡关的人豁然开朗;有趣的设计，大开的脑洞；而且具有超棒的剧情及剧情叙述方式，让你感觉你就是小Caroline（虽然我是个男的），享受那解开谜底的快乐。
说句题外话，最后那首歌这么获取。（关于剧情请在地底时务必保持超高的好奇心和作死的心）

I'm sure this has been said before, but despite being relatively short, Portal 2 is a hilarious game with great, brain teasing puzzles and even a few unexpected twists. Weirdly enough it actually got me a little emotional towards the ending, which is so satisfying, and GLaDOS is such a sweetheart, on top of that the little song at the end makes it all worth it.

I'm sure given another 10 years, this game will be remembered as one of the great classics like the old old arcade and NES games, which it totally deserves because it's honestly one of the best games I've played.

Now the only thing left is for Gaben to learn how to count to 3...

Portal 2 is an amazing game, such an amazing game I can't even describe how amazingly amazing it is, the game is an instant classic, taking place directly after the first game, (give or take a "few" years) it is such a great change of pace from other games today, the puzzles are easy but not easy enough to where you can breeze through them in a flash, they require some thinking, enough to when you complete it, you feel accomplished, the game has a much better atmosphere from the first, and the graphics and map detail are super good. Even though it was made almost 9 years ago now, it's still such an amazing game that everyone should play. I 100% recommend Portal 2 to anybody, from beginners to seasoned gamers, and community maps and mods have still kept this game alive for such a long time, the co-op is also a fun experience, well, if you describe fun as killing your teammate a bunch and spamming the "take head off" gesture, then yeah, it's really fun.
It has an amazing story and gameplay. My second favorite video game of all time. If you haven't got it, you should get it :p
Its the greatest game ive played in a while

I loved the first portal and this one is even more fun. I love Wheatley, especially after finding out he was on The Good Place, Now, every time I play the game, I laugh whenever I hear his voice. This is a wonderful game and one of the only sequels I've every played. I have played this game so many times it's not even funny because it doesn't get old. If you're looking for a fun casual game that isn't super stressful but is worth a laugh and makes you think, this is the game for you. It's wonderful. I recommend this and the first one both. They are both amazing.

Portal 2 is an excellent followup to the critically acclaimed original game. In many ways it feels like an evolution of the series however the introduction of over 5 new significant gameplay mechanics really drags the game down to a grinding halt within the final few hours. The excursion funnels would be an excellent addition if this game wasnt first person as they are extremely simple however take an extended amount of time to complete and they are present in the penultimate chapter of the game just after the excellent introduction of the portal goo. Alongside these issues, the story loses itself after the 2nd chapter when you enter actual test chambers and arent exploring the mysterious setting that the game puts you in. It feels like they are trying to pull on your heartstrings my re-introducing previous locales and this ultimately creates a formulaic experience.  The most interesting levels are when you arent in test chambers and are merely exploring the facility, listening to voice recordings of the founder of Aperture Science (voiced by the excellent J.K Simmons). Overall, this is a graphically pleasing game that is filled with hours of content due to the extensive length of the main story and slightly shorter co-op campaign. The user created levels are an excellent concept for this type of game however it seems like a missed opportunity as every level seems extremely similar and unimaginative. The challenge levels make for some excellent replayability of the main game and co-op however sometimes it can simply feel like trial and error instead of successive puzzle solving. You should definitely buy this game if you are interested in the overarching portal/half-life story however the conclusion of the game drags it down slightly. 

In my opinion Portal 2 deserves an 8/10 if i was to rate it and the co-op may even get a 9/10 due to the excellent fun that it can provide if communicating with a teammate.

心态差点崩了，最后把男机械送走了，就生怕那个女机械反悔，结果他说Caroline活在她脑海里，我想那不是妥了，结果这币扭头就把Caroline给删了，还说自己很诚实，当时我那个蛋疼，好在他还是答应放我走，坐电梯上升到地面，突然电梯停了门开了，四个机械人瞄着我，我他妈疯狂点鼠标疯狂点w a s d，发现动不了，当时我他妈心都凉了，结果没有事后面还跳起了舞，响起了bgm，好，电梯继续上升，尼玛！一群机器人围着我，不过我有经验了，不慌继续上升，最后到了外面。啊，夕阳下的花海，我想着终于打完了，结果后面门啪的一声又响了，默默看他扔出来一个费箱子，然后听男机械说话，他说很对不起，我心想你在放屁，最终在我的鄙视下游戏结束了。
怎么说呢，无论是剧情节奏，声音氛围，还是关卡构思，都很巧妙 。
值得一试。

是半条命和传送门让我相信，游戏是第九艺术，是独立于「电影 书籍 动画」之外崭新又独一无二的人文载体。

我实在是享受V社独特的叙事方式，没有过场动画，纯粹以一镜到底的方式，将解谜与剧情完美结合在一起，为玩家带来一场不同于其他载体的，独一无二的故事体验。

当然不止V社，世界上最早的叙事游戏从Roguelike时代便开始了，90年代末小岛秀夫的MGS1象征着游戏电影化的开端，而半条命则带着领叙事型FPS走向崛起。

我不知未来还能否再看到更多优秀的，或是令我惊叹的叙事游戏出现，或许游戏产业的天枰正在倾斜。但不论什么体裁，有喜欢它的人在便会出现，存在即合理。我也只能继续怀揣着自己的期待，直到与世界完全格格不入的那一天。
